title.rendered: Will they withdraw subsidies to plug-in hybrids?

content.rendered:
Are Plug-in Hybrid Vehicles (PHEV) a Scam? Today at MOTORK, we will try to answer that question.

Every day there are more and more PHEV, Plug-in Hybrid that we see on our roads. For what is this? basically because they are an interesting alternative, which adapts very well to the preferences of the Spanish.

Plug-in hybrid cars have the ability to be an electric vehicle on a day-to-day basis, without losing the usefulness of longer trips. The electric motor works on daily journeys such as going to work, shopping, etc. During these trips, PHEV vehicles do not consume a single drop of fuel.

Plug-in hybrids are very technologically advanced vehicles, but… Will PHEVs continue to have subsidies or a zero-emission label from the DGT?
